greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Bitwise-OR of the exponents of all 4k+1 primes in the prime factorization of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = a(A170818(n)). [The result depends only on the prime factors of the form 4k+1.]
xref: Cf. A004144 (indices of zeros), A009003 (of nonzeros).
Differs from both A046080 and A083025 for the first time at n=65, which here a(65) = 1.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 03 2016
